title: Action Learning-Based Manufacturing Quality Improvement and Cost Reduction Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of manufacturing processes and fundamental concepts of quality control
context.additional_context: Learners are novice-level manufacturing professionals with specialized backgrounds, participating in learning via smartphone-based limited-technology environments with self-directed, flexible scheduling

learning_goals: Analyze quality issues in manufacturing settings and establish three action plans for improvement.
Propose process optimization strategies for cost reduction based on real-world case studies.
Develop and validate organizationally applicable solutions through action learning team activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
